mapper.select: select m.p_no ,prj_no ,subject ,to_char(p.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "reg_date" ,field_name ,skill_name ,project_type ,people_to ,to_char(start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "start_time" ,to_char(end_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "end_time" ,content ,nickname ,img_name "img_name" from project p, competition_project_field_code c, person_mem m where p.prj_no = #{prj_no} and p.field_code = c.code_field and m.p_no = p.p_no

select count(*) from ( select prj_no ,subject ,project_type ,to_char(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "reg_date" ,read_count from project where 1=1
)
select count(*) from project where prj_no=#{prj_no} and pwd = #{pwd}

select count(*) from project p, competition_project_field_code c where p.field_code = c.code_field
and ( upper(p.subject) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(p.content) like upper('%${keyword}%') )
and to_number(to_char(end_time,'YYYYMMDD')) - to_number(to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD'))>0 and
to_number(to_char(start_time,'YYYYMMDD')) - to_number(to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD'))<0
and( upper(project_type) like upper('%${project_type}%') )

select * from ( select rownum RNUM, zxcvb.* from (
select comp_pk ,subject ,field_name
,read_count ,to_char(c.reg_date, 'MM-DD') as "reg_date" ,to_char(c.start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "start_time" ,to_char(c.end_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "end_time"
from competition c, competition_project_field_code p where c.field_code = p.code_field
and( upper(p.field_name) like upper('%${field_name}%') )
and to_number(to_char(c.end_time,'YYYYMMDD')) - to_number(to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD'))>0 and
to_number(to_char(c.start_time,'YYYYMMDD')) - to_number(to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD'))<0
and ( upper(c.subject) like upper('%${keyword}%') or upper(c.content) like upper('%${keyword}%') )
order by comp_pk desc
order by ${sort}
) zxcvb) where RNUM >= #{begin_rowNo} and RNUM <= #{end_rowNo}
